text:
precautions to ensure that the delivery of the head is a controlled one:
/circle6 Keep one hand gently on the head as it advances with the contractions.
/circle6 Support the perineum with the other hand and cover the anus with a pad held in position 
by the side of the hand
/circle6 Ask the mother to take deep breaths and to bear down only during a contraction. 
/circle6 Once the head is out, use gauze to gently wipe the mucus off   the baby’s face. 
/circle6 Feel gently around the baby’s neck
